description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中校，曾任总参情报部五局副局长，中国航天国际控股有限公司经理。她是中央军事委员会副主席刘华清的女儿，也是1996年美国竞选财务丑闻的主要人物之一，并曾卷入赖昌星案。
description.en: A Lieutenant Colonel in the People's Liberation Army, former deputy director of the fifth bureau of the General Staff Intelligence Department, and manager of China Aerospace International Holdings Ltd. She is the daughter of Liu Huaqing, former Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission. She was a key figure in the 1996 United States campaign finance controversy and was also implicated in the Lai Changxing case.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国航天国际控股有限公司

zh-cn: 中国航天国际控股有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国航天科技集团的下属公司，刘超英曾在此担任经理。
description.en: A subsidiary of China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation, where Liu Chaoying served as a manager.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总参谋部情报部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部情报部
en: Intelligence Department of the General Staff Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部下属的情报机构。
description.en: The intelligence agency under the General Staff Department of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高军事领导机关。
description.en: The highest military leading body of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人，曾任中央军事委员会副主席。他是刘超英的父亲。
description.en: A leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He is the father of Liu Chaoying.

description.zh-cn: 一起指控中华人民共和国政府试图影响1996年美国联邦选举的政治丑闻。
description.en: A political scandal alleging that the government of the People's Republic of China attempted to influence the 1996 United States federal elections.

description.zh-cn: 涉及赖昌星的重大经济犯罪案件，刘超英曾卷入此案。
description.en: A major economic crime case involving Lai Changxing, in which Liu Chaoying was implicated.

description.zh-cn: 中国商人，远华案主犯。
description.en: Chinese businessman and the main culprit in the Yuanhua case.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1958年至1961年间进行的社会主义建设运动，刘超英出生于此期间。
description.en: A socialist construction movement in the People's Republic of China from 1958 to 1961, during which Liu Chaoying was born.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防科学技术大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防科学技术大学

description.zh-cn: 位于湖南长沙的军事院校，刘超英曾在此学习电子计算机软件专业。
description.en: A military academy in Changsha, Hunan, where Liu Chaoying studied computer software.

description.zh-cn: 美籍华裔企业家，1996年美国竞选财务丑闻中的关键人物，与刘超英有业务往来并向民主党全国委员会捐款。
description.en: A Chinese-American entrepreneur and a key figure in the 1996 United States campaign finance controversy, who had business dealings with Liu Chaoying and made donations to the Democratic National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 美国第42任总统，刘超英曾由钟育瀚介绍与其会面。
description.en: The 42nd President of the United States, to whom Liu Chaoying was introduced by Johnny Chung.

description.zh-cn: 美国的证券业监督管理机构。
description.en: The securities industry regulatory agency in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾任马萨诸塞州参议员。刘超英曾参加他组织的会议。
description.en: American politician who served as a U.S. Senator from Massachusetts. Liu Chaoying attended a meeting organized by him.

description.zh-cn: 由刘超英和钟育瀚在洛杉矶成立的公司。
description.en: A company established in Los Angeles by Liu Chaoying and Johnny Chung.

nodes.id: 民主党全国委员会 (美国)

zh-cn: 民主党全国委员会 (美国)

description.zh-cn: 美国民主党的全国性组织。
description.en: The national organization of the Democratic Party in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任总参情报部领导。据钟育瀚称，姬胜德曾表示愿意提供资金影响美国选举。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army and former head of the General Staff Intelligence Department. According to Johnny Chung, Ji Shengde offered funds to influence the U.S. elections.

en: China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation

description.zh-cn: 中国大型国有企业，是中国航天国际控股有限公司的母公司。
description.en: A large state-owned enterprise in China and the parent company of China Aerospace International Holdings Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，刘超英的前夫。
description.en: Chinese politician and the ex-husband of Liu Chaoying.

description.zh-cn: 刘超英的儿子。
description.en: Son of Liu Chaoying.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省下辖的县，是刘超英的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Hubei Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Liu Chaoying.

description.zh-cn: 美国总统处理国家安全和外交事务的主要议事和决策机构。
description.en: The principal forum used by the President of the United States for consideration of national security and foreign policy matters.

description.zh-cn: 曾任美国国家安全委员会助理。
description.en: Former assistant at the U.S. National Security Council.

description.zh-cn: 美国国会的两院之一。
description.en: One of the two chambers of the United States Congress.

relationships.target: 中国航天国际控股有限公司
中国人民解放军总参谋部情报部

position.en: Deputy Director of the Fifth Bureau

description.zh-cn: 曾任该职务。
description.en: Formerly held this position.

description.zh-cn: 两人已离异。
description.en: They are divorced.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军国防科学技术大学

relationships.source: 中国航天国际控股有限公司

description.zh-cn: 刘超英是1996年美国竞选财务丑闻的主要人物之一。
description.en: Liu Chaoying was one of the key figures in the 1996 United States campaign finance controversy.

description.zh-cn: 刘超英曾卷入赖昌星案。
description.en: Liu Chaoying was implicated in the Lai Changxing case.

description.zh-cn: 两人在1996年6月相遇，并有业务往来。
description.en: The two met in June 1996 and had business dealings.

description.zh-cn: 钟育瀚将刘超英介绍给时任美国总统比尔·克林顿。
description.en: Johnny Chung introduced Liu Chaoying to then-U.S. President Bill Clinton.

description.zh-cn: 刘超英参加了一个由时任马萨诸塞州参议员约翰·克里组织的会议。
description.en: Liu Chaoying attended a meeting organized by then-Massachusetts Senator John Kerry.

description.zh-cn: 与钟育瀚共同在洛杉矶成立了马斯威尔投资公司。
description.en: Co-founded Marswell Investment in Los Angeles with Johnny Chung.

description.zh-cn: 与刘超英共同在洛杉矶成立了马斯威尔投资公司。
description.en: Co-founded Marswell Investment in Los Angeles with Liu Chaoying.

description.zh-cn: 刘超英向钟育瀚在香港的银行账户中转账30万美元。
description.en: Liu Chaoying transferred $300,000 to Johnny Chung's bank account in Hong Kong.

relationships.target: 民主党全国委员会 (美国)

description.zh-cn: 在1994年至1996年间，钟育瀚向民主党全国委员会共捐赠了366000美元。
description.en: Between 1994 and 1996, Johnny Chung donated a total of $366,000 to the Democratic National Committee.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军总参谋部情报部

description.zh-cn: 钟育瀚告诉联邦调查员，他向民主党全国委员会捐赠的钱中有35000美元来自中国军事情报部门。
description.en: Johnny Chung told federal investigators that $35,000 of the money he donated to the Democratic National Committee came from Chinese military intelligence.

description.zh-cn: 刘超英将钟育瀚介绍给中国军事情报部门领导姬胜德。
description.en: Liu Chaoying introduced Johnny Chung to Ji Shengde, the head of Chinese military intelligence.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部情报部

description.zh-cn: 姬胜德表示将给钟育瀚30万美元，用于赠与美国总统和民主党。
description.en: Ji Shengde stated that he would give Johnny Chung $300,000 to be donated to the U.S. President and the Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 钟育瀚于1999年5月向美国众议院委员会宣誓作证。
description.en: Johnny Chung testified under oath before a U.S. House committee in May 1999.
